      • Serialized Fields

          boolean for weather the game has started yet

          java.io.ObjectInputStream input
          the input stream from the server

          javax.swing.JButton inputNameButton
          submit button for their name

          java.lang.String name
          the name of the player
        • nameInput
          javax.swing.JTextField nameInput
          the text field to enter the users name

          javax.swing.JLabel nameLabel
          label explaining the users name or where to input it

          java.io.ObjectOutputStream output
          the output stream to the server
        • question
          Question question
          the current question
        • server
          java.lang.String server
          the ip address of the server
        • startButton
          javax.swing.JButton startButton
          button to start the game
        • submitButton
          javax.swing.JButton submitButton
          the submit button for every question
        • textAreaPanel
          javax.swing.JPanel textAreaPanel
          the bottom panel consisting of the display area
        • topPanel
          javax.swing.JPanel topPanel
          the top panel, starts as a way to input names and start the game and changes with each question

    • Class FillBlankQuestion extends Question implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • blanks
          javax.swing.JTextField[] blanks

        • blanksNum
          int blanksNum
          {int} contains the number of blanks within the question description
        • correctChoices
          java.lang.String[] correctChoices
          {String[]} contains all of the correct answers for the question
        • score
          double score
          {double} contains the score of the question

          javax.swing.JTextField[] splitQuestion
          {JTextField[]} contains the text fields for each of the blanks in the question

          java.lang.String[] splitQuestionDescription
          {String[]} contains the question split for the blanks
        • userAnswers
          java.lang.String[] userAnswers
          {String[]} contains all of the user's answers for the question

    • Class Question extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • fileName
          java.lang.String fileName
          stores the file name if there is media attached to the question

          java.lang.String questionDescription
          {String} contains the question itself

          {JPanel} will contain question prompt and question description

          javax.swing.JPanel questionOptions

          {String} contains user instructions for the question (how to answer)
        • score
          double score
          {double} contains score for question object

    • Class Server extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gameStarted

          checks if any player has started the game yet
